this_title: Viagra: The Little Blue Pill That Changed the World Season 1
introduction: The untold story of a blue pill that changed the world. Discovered by accident, developed against all odds, marketed like no drug in history and unleashed into a tidal wave of controversy, Viagra rewrote the playbook of big pharma and changed sex forever.1. The Hard ScienceIn England, scientists are about to stumble onto a drug that will change the world. The team is on the verge of shutting down a failed drug trial looking for new heart medication when a few subjects report a very unusual side effect.2. The Hard SellThe marketing team grapples with the toughest promotional campaign in history. How do you sell an erection drug without bringing down the reputation of a conservative company in a storm of controversy?3. The Hard TruthIn 1998, Viagra was released to a wave of hysteria, headlines and huge sales. But now, the carefully crafted marketing message is out of the team's hands.
